name: Hidden Stories (kiramaster117)
description:
Tu eres un investigador privado donde tu objetivo sera recolectar varios objetos para poder completar los niveles.

"Este es mi primer juego y soy novato con el motor Unreal."

you are a private investigator where your objective will be to collect various objects in order to complete the levels. "This is my first game and I'm a newbie to the Unreal engine."
